skill.name: Goetia's Wave
skill.value: Increases DMG taken by all enemies by 31%/37% for a limited time.

ability.name: Grimoire (Lv. 50)
ability.value: Skill attacks have a moderate chance of inflicting Stun.

ability.name: Lesser Key of Solomon (Lv. 80)
ability.value: All melee allies absorb a portion of DMG dealt as HP.
